Tooltip: Makes a GET request to the Assets endpoint and returns all Assets matching the Filter.

Arguments.Name: Filter
Arguments.Tooltip: OData filter string used as a query parameter. If you don’t provide a Filter, then you need to provide a Folder. Otherwise, you will receive ALL assets…

Arguments.Name: Folder
Arguments.Tooltip: The Folder where you want to search for the Asset. If you don’t provide a Folder, then you need to provide a Filter. Otherwise, you will receive ALL assets…

Arguments.Name: Assets
Arguments.Tooltip: The Assets returned by the API.
